about_the_game:
StarStorm is an RTS AutoBattler which pits players and their personal fleet of starships against mysterious enemies in a fierce tug-of-war.

Each player prepares combat units that are sent out in waves against the enemy, with the objective of overrunning and destroying them.

The player has the ability to select, upgrade, and replace what units are spawned between waves.

Hero Powers and Powerful Items let you customize the fighting style of your fleet.

Your unit choice, positioning, and knowledge of the countless unit interactions will be all that stands between securing a home for your people, and being cast into oblivion. . .

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 based graphics card
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Subject to Change

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Quad Core CPU
  • Graphics: DX11 based graphics card
